channel.title: Hamachi servers
channel.description: can anyone help on making a ham server ive tried no-ip but it never lets anyone on my server except myself. ive tried port forewarding and all that crap but i \t still dont work so im goin to hamachi. ive downloaded hamachi and made an acct and created a network but i dunno how to make my server comke online usin hamachi?ne help?

item.title: Hamachi servers
item.dc:creator: @hogesar hogesar
item.description:
@hogesar wrote:

Well, you should have name and password - with you inside one of the networks? Well, for people to connect, they simply enter your serv name and pass, then on moparscape use the ip next to your name to connect to your serv!

Read full topic
